entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Sault Ste. Marie

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 08:56 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 3.2°C
Wind: ESE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to flurries this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 50 this morning then west 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
